name: BSF
description:
Tired of the boringness of this world, three good sisters formed an adventure trio, ready to go to a place called BFS to explore, this place has been a long time no one has been, they are going to figure out why it is called BFS.

When I first came here, when I was about to set up camp, I was attacked one after another.

Introduction to gameplay

Three characters, three attack modes. You can freely choose to use the role. You can also play with your friends (the early access version is not open.)
Refreshingly hack and kill————broken arm, broken leg...
Explosive clothing system-clothes are durable. (You know)
Survival gameplay-survive until the base is built.
Break through and explore——Explore unknown areas and challenge different bosses.
Collecting and constructing——Collecting materials and building a base.
